name: Gohn
body: gohn ==== gohn — Hacker News in the terminal, written in Go. Inspired by [this](http://andrewvos.com/2013/08/02/hacker-news-in-the-terminal/) ## Install ~~~text go install github.com/gedex/gohn ~~~ ## Usage ~~~text $ gohn ~~~ ## License This library is distributed under the BSD-style license found in the LICENSE.md file.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
